Crystal reaches down. Your heart skips a beat and your mind screams for escape, yet your limbs are frozen in place. She scoops you up in the palm of her right hand. You are lifted up to her face, mere inches from her mouth.

It is obvious, as it always should have been, that she is simply playing with you. She can end this game at any time. And that time is now.

Crystal sucks you back in as if you were little more than a strand of spaghetti. Your frantic kicks and screams do nothing to stop her. Crystal places an index finger on the top of your head and uses it to push you back inside. You attempt to swat away the finger with your arms, but do nothing to stop her. her lips and tongue work together to gobble you up. Before you know it, your head has passed over her teeth and you are surrounded by an enamel prison. Only your arms stick out now, latched onto her index finger. As the finger withdraws, you hold on as best you can, but your best isn't nearly good enough. The finger is pulled out of her mouth, but you are still trapped inside.

Your forearms curl around her lips, once again hoping to keep yourself from sinking in any further. The slimy slickness of her spit does not allow your grip for long. Crystal puckers her lips as if for a kiss, your arms visible outside for but a moment, before they are also sucked in. Her head tilts back, and you search for another grip, but there is none. Your hands grasp, your toes dig into the soft, fleshy interior, but you slip backwards nevertheless. Looking back, you see the dark, cavernous abyss that leads to Crystal's throat, and this leads to her stomach.

Your left leg slips underneath you, then goes straight as it dangles over the precipice. You try to bring your legs up again, but find that they are hopelessly bound together inside her throat. The peristaltic pull of her throat muscles urge you inside, and you cannot resist. You fight, but you still slip deeper inside of the throat of you sister.

Your will to live and the hunger of your sister for your flesh wage a war of wills. But despite your desire not to become Crystal's meal, her desire to eat you is winning.

You are now barely in the mouth anymore. Only your head and arms can be said to be in her mouth, as you stare out at her teeth and tongue. Every few second, another tug pulls you down. The back of her tongue rams you down into her throat, and the throat muscles hug you, squeeze you down enough so that you can't even see the inside of her mouth anymore.

But you are still a big meal for her, and the muscles soon tire and release you. You are able to barely worm your way back up, able to reach out and touch her tongue once more.

Another pull drags you down again, this time engulfing your head, and you feel as if you are drowning for a moment. Crystal holds you there, a lump adamantly stuck in her throat, for a few more seconds before releasing. As you pop back up, you reach up and your hands grasp her uvula. You seize it, hanging on just enough so that the next peristaltic push does not drag your head inside of the throat. But it does pull you down enough that your hands slide down, compromising your grasp. Crystal shakes her head rapidly from side to side, and your grip is broken.

Crystal takes advantage of the opportunity and swallows mightily. Your head immediately is surrounded by the soft, yet firm muscles of her throat. No matter what you tried, you couldn't get free. Your mother walked in, still holding you behind her. You knew you could bite her to get free, but you couldn't bring yourself to do it. Though you couldn't see it, Crystal was starting to wake up, and she was hungry.

"Oh mother, must I get up now? I'm still a little tired." Crystal said, yawning.

"Dear, I know that you like to taste new food, and I have something for you. Something tasty. Someone tasty." Mom said, getting ready to reveal you.

"What do you mean . . Someone?" Crystal asked, slowly. Mom held your tiny body in front of her. You were pretty scared, but you weren't going to run away. Your mother dropped your naked body onto Crystal's lap.

"I shrunk her, and I hope you enjoy her. Don't worry about killing her, when you eat her, she will re-spawn. I'll leave you two alone so you can have fun." Mom left, closing the door behind her. As soon as she was gone, Crystal grabbed you.

"Well well, it looks like I have the advantage. I know exactly what I want to do with you." She said.

info.brief_description: Carol is your average teen when she suddenly shrinks. (vore/cannibal content within)
info.description:
this is the story of Carol, a normal 16 year old girl. she has a slender body, blue eyes and long red hair which she keeps in a ponytail. however today is different because today she will end up shrunken in her home with her mom and two sisters.

Susan is Carol's mom, she's about 35, she's a brunet with brown eyes and she too has a slender build. she is kind and yet has a secret desire that is a very dark one.

Mina is Carols younger sister at the age of 12, she has long brown hair and blue eyes and she constantly taunts Carol about various things. this annoys Carol to no end.

Crystal is Carol's older sister at the age of 18. she has long black hair and black eyes. she's a goth girl to the end and she likes sandwiches as a sort of comfort food to keep her going.

please follow these rules:
1. no guys or additional characters, this will be enforced.
2. this story is a vore/cannibalism story but I don't want to see generic swallowed alive scenes.
3. no crushing, toilet stuff, sex, or things like that.
4. Carol can regenerate (by that I mean that she can reform as herself and only herself and only at her current size) so just because she gets chewed up doesn't mean she's dead.
5. no transformation!
6. have fun, I hope to see carol in a sandwich soon.
7. NEW RULE you can not kill of caren. (if she can reform from being chewed up she can reform from being digested.) and no more one to two sentence chapters unless it's a choice chapter.
